item.title: Adding specials
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

public void specials() { // real working specs by i loot i if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(1658); attackPlayersWithin(341, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1); hitDiff = 24; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; // Specs - by i loot i specglow = false; { if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1231) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(252); attackPlayersWithin(341, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1); hitDiff = 24; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; // Specs - by i loot i specglow = false; } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that."); // Specs }
?(i forgot to add that send message part before…) but that doesn’t work if thats what u mean

item.title: Adding specials
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

ok, im adding specials to I loot I’s satan isle, and im wondering whats wrong with this?

it was

public void specials() { // real working specs by i loot i if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(1658); attackPlayersWithin(341, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1); hitDiff = 24; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; // Specs - by i loot i specglow = false;

now im trying to add a dds special to it, and i add…

public void specials() { // real working specs by i loot i if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(1658); attackPlayersWithin(341, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1); hitDiff = 24; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; // Specs - by i loot i specglow = false; if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1231) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(252); attackPlayersWithin(341, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1); hitDiff = 24; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; // Specs - by i loot i specglow = false; } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that."); // Specs }

like that, and otherways, but i always get this error

public void SpecialsProcess() { // real working specs by i loot i ^

this is probably a really easy error :\ sorry if it is…im just kinda experimenting…i don’t claim this code mine in any way
